column1: Weighted MRI size (128, 256, 1) in T2, exhibiting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°179 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1886.5723 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5769.1406 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 644.6777 mm³.
